articles.author: Chris Young
articles.title: 'Walking' Robot Arm Will Launch to ISS After 20-Year Delay - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: The European Robotic Arm (ERA) will assist astronauts during spacewalks in addition to installing and replacing elements on the outside of the ISS.
articles.content: The European Robotic Arm (ERA) is set to finally launch to the International Space Station (ISS) on July 15, and dock on July 23, following two decades of delays due to technical issues, a report by … [+1934 chars]
